description: Try our easy to follow Pasta with Spicy Sausage & Olives recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pasta with Spicy Sausage & Olives Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water as per packet instructions. Drain and divide between bowls, spoon sauce over and top with parmesan.
Cook pasta in plenty of boiling salted water as per packet instructions. Drain and divide between bowls, spoon sauce over and top with parmesan.
